definition: a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: I'm afraid we liaven't the size you want .
sentences.chinese: 抱愧，我們沒有你要的尺碼。

sentences.english: But go in knowing your general size and measurements.
sentences.chinese: 但要知道你的普遍尺碼和量度尺寸。

sentences.english: I want an amethyst ring, but I do not know what my ring size is.
sentences.chinese: 我要一隻紫水晶戒指，但是我不知道我的戒指尺碼。

sentences.english: The fur length and quality were good.
sentences.chinese: 貂皮尺碼和皮張質量優良。

sentences.english: Some are designing multiple versions of a garment to fit different body shapes.
sentences.chinese: 有些設計同款服裝的多種尺碼以便適合不同體型。

sentences.english: Dress sizes range from petite to extra large.
sentences.chinese: 服裝尺碼從特小號到特大號不等。

sentences.english: Still, she said, she will soon try to sell the sizing system again.
sentences.chinese: 但她仍然說，她很快將再次開始推銷這一尺碼體系。

sentences.english: I try it on and then go back and get the same size.
sentences.chinese: 試穿完後，我就回頭去拿另一件同樣尺碼的新衣。

sentences.english: When he set out for the market he forgot to bring it along.
sentences.chinese: 可當他趕往市集時，卻忘了帶量好的尺碼。

sentences.english: Have you get anything in the way of purple dacron , size36
sentences.chinese: 你們有36尺碼的紫色滌綸女服嗎？

sentences.english: The plus-size market in women’s clothes is increasing.
sentences.chinese: 加大尺碼的市場範圍正在女人衣服圈中逐漸擴大。

sentences.english: Our products are rich, full-size , reliable quality and reasonable price.
sentences.chinese: 本廠產品豐富，尺碼齊全，質量可靠，價格合理。

sentences.english: He bought a greatcoat for himself of soothing proportions.
sentences.chinese: 他給自己買了一件尺碼肥大舒適的大衣。

sentences.english: I'm frightened we liaven't the size you want .
sentences.chinese: 歉仄，我們沒有你要的尺碼。

sentences.english: Which underband size that you are belonging to?
sentences.chinese: 你屬於哪一個下圍尺碼？

sentences.english: I'm not familiar with your sizes.
sentences.chinese: 我不太瞭解你們的尺碼。

definition: cheating neither old nor young (idiom); treating youngsters and old folk equally scrupulously/Our house offers sincere treatment to all and fair trade to old and young alike.
to make to order/to have sth made to order
to hang up (a phone)/to leave a computer etc running (idling, downloading, or playing a game in one's stead etc)
tuba/large size (clothes, print etc)/(polite) (your) name/(coll.) number two/to defecate
